task.title: Install using the all platforms installer

taskbody.context: To install using the all platforms installer:All steps are conrefed from the common topic source except 5 which has platform specific file names.

step.cmd: Start by running oxygenMac.shoxygenAuthorMac.shoxygenDeveloperMac.shsyncroSVNClientMac.sh, which is located in the install folder.

info.note: A Java virtual machine runtime environment (JRE) version 1.6.0 or later needs to be available.
